skill_e.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for ? seconds. The shield absorbs ? magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

skill_i.tooltip: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

skill_q.tooltip: Hurls a blast of starfire that roots the first enemy hit for ? seconds and deals ? magic damage.

skill_r.tooltip:
Morgana chains herself to nearby enemy Champions, dealing ? magic damage and slowing them by ?%. After ? seconds, enemies unable to break the chains take an additional ? magic damage and are stunned for ? seconds.

While casting Soul Shackles, Morgana gains ?% Movement Speed towards enemies she has chained.

skill_w.tooltip:
Ignites an area for ? seconds, dealing ? magic damage every second to enemies inside. Damage is increased by up to ?% based on targets' missing Health.

Tormented Shadow's cooldown is reduced by ?% every time Morgana is healed by Soul Siphon.
